"Recon Gigantix":
"Recon Gigantix are groups of Gigantix which appear in the Stia Region.

Recon Gigantix can appear in any weather, and patrol specific locations on the field."

"Recon Gigantix are groups of Gigantix which appear in Exploration Sections.
